price: Então, apanhamo-lo, a ele e a seu exército, e deitamo-los fora, na onda, enquanto censurado.
arabic: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٞ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhnāhu wajunūdahu fanabadhnāhum fī al-yami wahuwa mulīmun
